references.paper_title: On contraction analysis for non-linear systems
references.reason: This paper introduces the fundamental concept of contraction theory, which forms the core theoretical underpinning of the ELCD model and its global stability guarantees.

references.paper_title: Non-Euclidean contraction theory for robust nonlinear stability
references.reason: This paper extends the classical contraction theory to non-Euclidean spaces, which is crucial for analyzing the ELCD model's behavior in more general metric spaces.
